是咁的 岩岩就用dotnet做完左個program

咁就認住publish去sever到就出街

不過第1次run就勁慢 等14秒先load到

第2次因爲cache所以先快返

咁我就諗住set up 個local cdn 不過google左好耐

都搵唔到open source

夾硬啲你喺 host file 指

但你 browser 應該會有 cache 唔會快得幾多

[9upmode]
1. find a server
2. setup nginx that only serve static files
3. put all your static files into /var/html/www
4. setup bind
5. resolve your dns
6. ???
7. profit
[/9upmode]

nginx maybe overkill unless u want fast lru cache

use npm -g i serve && serve -s maybe well enough
